did.unittitle:
Caroline Bartlett Crane addresses and other printed items
1889-1922

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was drawn together from different sources.

accruals.p: No further additions to the collection are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Caroline Bartlett Crane addresses and other printed items, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Caroline Bartlett Crane was a Kalamazoo, Michigan Unitarian minister.

scopecontent.p: This collection of published addresses and other items of Caroline Bartlett Crane was accumulated from different sources.
